titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on amitraz.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/11/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1998, the duty on N'-(2,4-dimethylphenyl)-N-(((2, 4 dimethylphenyl)imino) methyl)-N methylmethanimidamide (also known as amitraz).
